TopicTitle: What would you build if lag didnt exist?

Articles.Content:
This is not possible as all computers will lag at some point in KSP!!

But if it was possible I would start a new save then build a giant space station and dock multiple copies of all different kinds of ships and rovers and landers and then make it my goal to explore the Kerbol system using only what I had assembled. It would need crew quarters and a lot of fuel, RCS and even aeroplane fuel (for exploring Kerbin too).

What would you do?

Ringworld, thats what I'd build

Boris

well I can dream cant I ?
I would build a death star.

I would build biggest, most overengineered and ridiculously overpowered lander with all bells and whistles - able to land and SSTO from Eve and Tylo. Then i would build equally OP interplanetary tug. And send both on that Grand Tour i'm always planning, but never executing because new update always comes first

Pfft I'd make it so my Duna Space Center didn't have to be do spread out; I have to keep the mining facility and construction site apart as they lag like hell if both are in load range. Plus id make it that the ground defense force didnt have to be stationed 2.5 km away, and actually build them base and storage hangers as it would be too many parts currently
How many parts are you putting on your ships that you are getting lag? I have not run into it while piloting.

Old tv show called "Space Above and Beyond"

I've made a hammerhead fighter from the show... Now I need to build the carrier ship, the Saratoga, and dock a squadron to it.

I pretend it doesn't exist, that's close enough right?

I would launch my 3k parts unfilled supercarrier and stock it up with completely unnecessary things.....and probably crash it into the SPH when I'm bored with it(just because it's about the same size:P)

EDIT: Sorry I read it as do.

Edited May 4, 2014 by Spartwo
The same stuff, maybe a bit less stingy with the OX-STATS. But I'd fly it more quickly.
I would download every good mod plus every not-so-good mod, then construct a massive KAS base on Minmus spanning the entire moon. Then I would get bored of not having lag.
A sphere with a diameter of ~2.2 km, composed of just about anything. It would spontaneously emerge into existence upon approaching it, emerging right in front of you.
The Battlestar Galactica and a fleet of Vipers. And a few Cylon raiders just for posterity. But that'd require both a no-lag setup and also for me to have enough creativity to build it.
I'd build a Halo, As big as Physics would allow.
A dyson sphere.
I would finally build massive space stations like those seen in X3: Albion Prelude. Oh, to dream.
Probably my largest concept of space station "The Eskalenter"!
I would build a full scale replica of the earth
I should build a space pirate ship... with 20 space fighters at the hangar... solar sail... torpeedos... decoys... everything... and call it Nautilus...
A giant moon/planet/thingamabob orbiting in LKO... if it wasn't for the 2 km limit.
A half scale (loading ranges) starbase, and the entire federation fleet. Stock.
Space elevator, then just fill LKO with structures.

The Battlestar Galactica and a fleet of Vipers. And a few Cylon raiders just for posterity. But that'd require both a no-lag setup and also for me to have enough creativity to build it.

This

+ few Cylon basestars so i have something to blow up
A supership, capeable of putting a space station into orbit around every planet and a permenant base on every planet in one flight. Then, a working Druna Skass from naval ops.
inb4whackjob
I want to build aircraft carrier so much,but I cant do it right now..
